name: Kampf um die Kontrolle
text: Give to the Flash Thompson player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Flash Thompson and take 2 damage → discard this obligation. - Put 1 set-aside copy of Enraged Symbiote into play engaged with the first player. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

flavor: The Venom symbiote is distraught, bonding with everyone it touches and sending them into a destructive rage.
name: Klyntar-Raserei
text: Threat cannot be removed from this scheme while a [[Symbiote]] enemy is in play.

boost_text: Put Enraged Symbiote into play engaged with you.
flavor: "You will kneel before the true Destroyer!"
name: Erzürnter Symbiont
text: Guard. Patrol. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot thwart the main scheme.) (Venom's nemesis minion.)
